tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_campaign_performance (
    campaign_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance_data (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    total_impressions INT,
    total_clicks INT,
    click_through_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    spend DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES social_media_campaigns(campaign_id)
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_channels (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_name VARCHAR(50),
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    followers INT,
    engagement_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_data (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    ad_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_ads (
  ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  platform_id INT,
  ad_content TEXT,
  ad_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);
